title: deprecate forceMerge/optimize and create forceMergeAndFreeze
description:
Spinoff from LUCENE-7976

Part of that discussion surfaced the idea that optimize/forceMerge is being discouraged, but the use-cases for forceMerge still need to be supported. Those use cases make sense when an index changes rarely.

This JIRA is to explore what that would look like.

comments.content: Straw-man statement for discussion: If we implement the changes in LUCENE-7976 then setting max segment size to unlimited and tuning how aggressively segments are merged based on % deleted documents, then this wouldn't be necessary.
comments.author: Erick Erickson
